title: DrinkingWaterTreatment - Coagulation Process
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a coagulation process in a drinking water treatment plant. It captures key process variables such as coagulant concentration and lane information.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be CoagulationProcess

fecl3_concentration.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Units: 'mg/L'. Ferric chloride (FeCl3) concentration used for coagulation dosing.

after_dredging.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Process variable measured after the dredging step (unit according to plant configuration).

lane.description: Property. Model: https://schema.org/Number. Lane or treatment line identifier where the coagulation process takes place.
